name: titan-core
title: Titan Core
desc: Titan Core is a high-performance, feature-rich theme for Astro JS, designed for modern websites, blogs, and portfolios. With beautiful UI components, multiple theme options, and a focus on performance, Titan Core helps you build stunning websites quickly.
article:
Titan Core is a high-performance, feature-rich theme for Astro JS, designed for modern websites, blogs, and portfolios. With beautiful UI components, multiple theme options, and a focus on performance, Titan Core helps you build stunning websites quickly.
